infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to track delivery routes and provide navigation to customers.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app uses location to track delivery routes even when running in the background so customers can track their orders.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: This app uses location to track delivery routes even when running in the background so customers can track their orders.
